Home » 40P21 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
51 Saññojanādichagocchaka, Sanidassanattika
Saññojanādichagocchaka, Sanidassanattika
99.
266Nosaññojanaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . (Tīṇi pañhā. Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
100.
267Noganthaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
268Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
101.
269Nooghaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noogho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
270Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
102.
271Noyogaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noyogo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
272Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
103.
273Nonīvaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
274Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
104.
275Noparāmāsaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
276Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
